sentences.sContent: I hate being stood over by the FBI.
sentences.sContent_eng: I hate being stood over by the FBI.
sentences.sCn: 我可讨厌受到联邦调查局的监视。

sentences.sContent: To find out who she is, they call on a local curator, as well as Bob Wittman and his FBI Art Crime Team.
sentences.sContent_eng: To find out who she is, they call on a local curator, as well as Bob Wittman and his FBI Art Crime Team.
sentences.sCn: 为了弄清楚她是谁，他们找到了当地的博物馆，以及鲍勃·惠特曼和他的联邦调查局艺术犯罪小组。

sentences.sContent: Police, lawyers and FBI agents were all among the groups who were unable to tell if people were lying.
sentences.sContent_eng: Police, lawyers and FBI agents were all among the groups who were unable to tell if people were lying.
sentences.sCn: 团队里包括警察，律师和美国联邦调查局人员，都是那些无法辨别出人们是否在说谎。

trans.tranOther: The FBI is a government agency in the United States that investigates crimes in which a national law is broken or in which the country's security is threatened
